scripts.build-mobile: next build && next export && npx cap sync && cd android && ./gradlew assemblerelease && cd ../
scripts.android: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx capacitor run android --livereload --external --open
scripts.live_android_avd1: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx capacitor run android --livereload --external --target=avd1
scripts.live_android: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx capacitor run android --livereload --external --target=789a2ffc
scripts.live_android2: next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx capacitor run android --livereload --external --target=3VLYD22817601242
scripts.electron: rm -rf electron && next build && next export && npx cap sync && npx cap add @capacitor-community/electron && npx cap open @capacitor-community/electron
